questions_1.question: What is the purpose of the P0 input?
Options: To provide the ambient pressure to the altitude idle reset system within the MFC
To provide extreme pressure to the altitude idle reset system within the MFC
To provide the ambient pressure to the altitude idle reset system within the CBP
To provide the extreme pressure to the altitude idle reset system within the CBP

That's Correct!
